title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 13)
description: A general criticizes Henry's regiment for its failed charge, but Henry and Wilson hear that a colonel took notice of their bravery. Henry guards the flag during a new and desperate battle.
meta: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
